spell.name: Zagovori: Enshroud [2024]
spell.text:
You shroud the vision of one creature you can see within range. If the target has 40 Hit Points or fewer, it has the Blinded condition. Otherwise, nothing happens.
Zagovory. When you expend Hit Dice while casting this spell, increase the Hit Point threshold by a number equal to the Hit Dice roll plus your Constitution modifier.
Source: Zamanora: Ballad of the Witch p. 143 (Homebrew)

spell.name: Zagovori: Hush [2024]
spell.text:
You steal the voice of a creature you can see within range. If the creature has 30 Hit Points or fewer, it can no longer speak or make vocal sounds until the end of its next turn. Otherwise, nothing happens.
Zagovory. When you expend Hit Dice while casting this spell, increase the Hit Point threshold by a number equal to the Hit Dice roll plus your Constitution modifier.
Source: Zamanora: Ballad of the Witch p. 143 (Homebrew)

spell.name: Zagovori: Obey [2024]
spell.text:
You utter an absolute command against a creature you can see within range. If the target has 90 Hit Points or fewer, it must use its Reaction to immediately perform one Action from its stat block of your choice against a target of your choice. The Action must be one the creature is capable of taking, and the target must be one the creature can see. Otherwise, nothing happens.
Zagovory. When you expend Hit Dice while casting this spell, increase the Hit Point threshold by a number equal to the Hit Dice roll plus your Constitution modifier.
Source: Zamanora: Ballad of the Witch p. 143 (Homebrew)

spell.name: Zagovori: Reject [2024]
spell.text:
You compel a creature to stay away from you. If the target has 30 Hit Points or fewer, it is immediately pushed away so that it is up to 30 feet away from you, unless an obstacle such as a wall or a cliff stops their movement. For the next 1 minute, the creature must spend 4 feet of movement for every 1 foot it moves toward you. Otherwise, nothing happens.
Zagovory. When you expend Hit Dice while casting this spell, increase the Hit Point threshold by a number equal to the Hit Dice roll plus your Constitution modifier.
Source: Zamanora: Ballad of the Witch p. 144 (Homebrew)

spell.name: Zagovori: Reveal [2024]
spell.text:
You speak a word that strips away all illusion. All creatures that can hear you and have 50 Hit Points or fewer, dispel all Illusion spells affecting them. Additionally, if they are currently not in their original form, they revert back to it. If they have 50 Hit Points or more, nothing happens.
Zagovory. When you expend Hit Dice while casting this spell, increase the Hit Point threshold by a number equal to the Hit Dice roll plus your Constitution modifier.
Source: Zamanora: Ballad of the Witch p. 144 (Homebrew)

spell.name: Zagovori: Seal [2024]
spell.text:
You enchant a creature to make a prison out of its own flesh. If the target has 90 Hit Points or fewer, it suffers a grueling fate. Every time the target moves 5 feet or more, or takes an Action, its Speed is reduced by 5 feet. If its Speed reaches 0, it becomes Petrified for one year. Otherwise, nothing happens.
Zagovory. When you expend Hit Dice while casting this spell, increase the Hit Point threshold by a number equal to the Hit Dice roll plus your Constitution modifier.
Source: Zamanora: Ballad of the Witch p. 144 (Homebrew)

spell.name: Zagovori: Suffer [2024]
spell.text:
Your very words cause a creature to feel pain. If the target has 20 Hit Points or fewer, it takes 1d8 Force damage at the start of its turn. The spell persists until it has dealt damage up to the Hit Point threshold it can affect. Otherwise, nothing happens.
Zagovory. When you expend Hit Dice while casting this spell, increase the Hit Point threshold by a number equal to the Hit Dice roll plus your Constitution modifier.
Source: Zamanora: Ballad of the Witch p. 145 (Homebrew)

spell.name: Zagovori: Wane [2024]
spell.text:
You utter a word that saps a creature of its vigor. If the target has 60 Hit Points or fewer, it gains a level of Exhaustion. This spell can increase already existing Exhaustion levels, but doesn't stack with itself. Otherwise, nothing happens.
Zagovory. When you expend Hit Dice while casting this spell, increase the Hit Point threshold by a number equal to the Hit Dice roll plus your Constitution modifier.
Source: Zamanora: Ballad of the Witch p. 145 (Homebrew)
